 C5i :

 At the core, C5is focus is to deliver business impact at speed and scale by driving adoption of AI\\-assisted decision\\-making.
   

  

 C5i caters to some of the worlds largest enterprises, including many Fortune 500 companies.
   

  

 The companys clients span Technology, Media, and Telecom (TMT), Pharma \\& Lifesciences, CPG, Retail, Banking, and other sectors.
   

  

 C5i has been recognized by leading industry analysts like Gartner and Forrester for its Analytics and AI capabilities and proprietary AI\\-based platforms.
   

  

**Global offices :** 
 United States \\| Canada \\| United Kingdom \\| UnitedArab of Emirates\\| India
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
 Frontend Developer :
   

  

* Academic degree in, but not limited to, Bachelors or Masters in CA, CS, or any engineering discipline.
* Beyond academic degrees, we give more weightage to 4\\+ years of real\\-world experience to develop scalable \\& high\\-quality software.
* We are looking for candidates who can start immediate.


**Must Have Skills**
* Proficiency in front\\-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
* Extensive experience with React (including Next.js) and related ecosystem libraries (e.g., React Router, React Query).
* Solid understanding of state management solutions such as Redux, Context API, or equivalent.

* Proficiency with JavaScript testing frameworks such as Jest, React Testing Library, or Cypress
* Good understanding of Git, including branching models, code linting, and adhering to coding style guidelines.

* Good understanding of charting libraries such as Chart.js and D3\\.js.
* Knowledge of UI design patterns and architectures like MVVM, MVC, or MVP for scalable application development


 C5i is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.
   

  

 We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, etc.

title: Frontend Developer - Javascript/TypeScript
description:
**Job Description**
 We are looking for a skilled and experienced Frontend Developer with strong proficiency in React JS who can work closely with Java\\-based Microservices on the backend. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and integrating responsive user interfaces and seamlessly consuming RESTful APIs.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and develop interactive, reusable, and responsive web components using React JS.
* Collaborate with backend teams to integrate Java\\-based Microservices through REST APIs.
* Develop modular and scalable frontend applications in line with micro\\-frontend architecture.
* Translate UI/UX designs and wireframes into high\\-quality code.
* Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and optimize for performance.
* Maintain code quality through best practices, code reviews, and unit testing.
* Troubleshoot and debug issues across frontend and service integration layers.
* Participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies, ensuring timely delivery and collaboration.


**Required Skills**
**FRONTEND (REACT JS):**
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6\\+), HTML5, CSS3, and TypeScript.
* Hands\\-on experience with React JS, Redux / Context API, React Hooks, React Router, etc.
* Familiarity with Component Libraries like Material\\-UI, Ant Design, or Bootstrap.
* Knowledge of Webpack, Babel, NPM/Yarn, and modern build tools.
* Experience in unit testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library).


**Backend Integration**
* Good understanding of RESTful APIs and JSON.
* Experience integrating with Java\\-based Microservices (Spring Boot preferred).
* Basic understanding of Java to facilitate debugging and collaborative development.


**Preferred Skills**
* Familiarity with micro\\-frontend architecture and containerized deployments (Docker/Kubernetes).
* Exposure to CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions).
* Experience with version control (Git) and Agile tools (JIRA, Confluence).
* Knowledge of authentication frameworks (OAuth2, JWT).
* Understanding of DevOps practices and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.


**Educational Qualification**
 Bachelors / Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
   

  

**Note**
 (i) Our client is looking for immediate \\& early joiners.
   

  

 (ii) Having LinkedIn Profile is a must.

title: Sr Backend Engineer – Integrations
description:
* About the opportunity We are looking for a passionate Senior Software Engineer, Backend who will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining product features of our IAM platform. You will collaborate closely with cross\\-functional teams to implement robust and scalable solutions that meet the evolving needs of our customers. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of a high\\-impact startup while working on cutting\\-edge technologies in the field of identity and access management.You Will:
+ Design, develop, and maintain backend services and APIs for our IAM platform, ensuring high performance, scalability, and reliability.
+ Collaborate with product managers, other software engineers, and security experts to build product features that meet business objectives and security standards.
+ Develop and maintain Access Intelligence features that curate the actionable insights from customer's environments.
+ Develop and maintain identity lifecycle management features, including user provisioning, de\\-provisioning, and access control policies.
+ Implement logging, monitoring, and auditing capabilities to ensure visibility and compliance with regulatory requirements.
+ Continuously optimize and improve the performance, security, and scalability of the IAM platform through code reviews, testing, and refactoring.
+ Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies in identity and access management, and leverage them to drive innovation and improve our platform.


**You Have:**
* Education:Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Experience:Proven 4\\+yrs in backend software development, with a focus on identity and access management, security, or related areas.
* Strong proficiency in one or more programming languages, such as Golang, Java.
* Experience designing and implementing RESTful APIs and microservices architectures.
* Solid understanding of authentication and authorization protocols, standards, and best practices.
* Experience with cloud platforms, such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform, and familiarity with IAM services and features.
* Others:
* Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies, such as Docker and Kubernetes, is a plus.
* Knowledge of database technologies (SQL and NoSQL), caching mechanisms, and distributed systems.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\\-paced environment.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.


**Our Culture**
 We're driven to build a strong company culture and are looking for individuals with solid alignment with the following:
   

  

* Ownership Mindset
* Act with Integrity
* Guardians of our Customers
* Opinionated Humility
* Build Trust, Earn Trust


 At Veza, your base pay is one part of your total compensation package. For this position, the reasonably expected pay range can be discussed with your recruiter for the level at which this job has been scoped. Your base pay will depend on several factors, including your experience, qualifications, education, location, and skills. In the event that you are considered for a different level, a higher or lower pay range would apply. This position is also eligible for equity and a competitive benefits package.
   

  

 Veza is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunities regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, veteran status, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We also consider qualified applicants according to applicable federal, state, and local laws. If a candidate with a disability requires an accommodation during the recruitment process, please email
 **recruiting@veza.com**
**About Veza**
 Veza is the identity security company. Identity and security teams use Veza to secure identity access across SaaS apps, on\\-prem apps, data systems, and cloud infrastructure. Veza solves the blind spots of traditional identity tools with its unique ability to ingest and organize permissions metadata in the Veza Authorization Graph. Global enterprises like Blackstone, Wynn Resorts, and Expedia trust Veza to visualize access permissions, monitor permissions activity, automate access reviews, and remediate privilege violations. Founded in 2020, Veza is headquartered in Redwood City, California, and is funded by Accel, Bain Capital, Ballistic Ventures, GV, Norwest Venture Partners, and True Ventures. Visit us at veza.com and follow us on LinkedIn, Twitter, and YouTube.

title: Interesting Job Opportunity: Software Integration Engineer - Drone/UAV Systems
description:
**Job Description : Drone Manufacturing \\& Software Integration Engineer**
**Position Overview**
 We are seeking an innovative and skilled Drone Manufacturing \\& Software Integration Engineer to join our technology team. The role involves designing, developing, and integrating UAV hardware and software systems for industrial and safety applications.
   

  

 You will be responsible for building reliable drones, integrating IoT sensors and payloads, and ensuring seamless communication between drones, ground stations, and cloud platforms. This role is ideal for engineers passionate about combining mechanical, electrical, and software systems to deliver cutting\\-edge drone\\-based solutions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**Drone Manufacturing \\& Hardware :**
* Design and assemble drones (multirotor, fixed\\-wing, hybrid) for industrial/safety applications.
* Integrate payloads such as thermal cameras, LiDAR, gas detectors, and multispectral sensors.
* Work on propulsion systems, aerodynamics, flight stability, and endurance optimization.
* Perform prototype testing, field trials, and compliance with aviation regulations (DGCA/FAA).


**Software Integration \\& IoT Systems**
* Develop and integrate flight control systems (Pixhawk, ArduPilot, PX4, DJI SDK).
* Program onboard processors for autonomous navigation, obstacle avoidance, and data acquisition.
* Integrate drones with IoT platforms, cloud dashboards, and AI\\-based safety analytics.
* Work with communication protocols (LoRa, 4G/5G, RF, Wi\\-Fi, Satellite) for real\\-time telemetry.
* Develop ground control interfaces (mobile/desktop apps) for drone operation and safety monitoring.


**Industrial Safety Applications**
* Customize drone solutions for safety inspections, accident investigations, and hazardous area monitoring.
* Deploy drones for scaffolding inspection, confined space monitoring, and environmental safety audits.
* Support integration with existing EHS management software (incident reporting, risk analytics).


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* Bachelors/Masters degree in Mechatronics, Robotics, Aerospace, Computer Science, or related field.
* 2 to 6 years of experience in drone/UAV development and software integration.
* Strong knowledge of embedded programming (C/C\\+\\+/Python).
* Hands\\-on experience with flight controllers, autopilot systems (PX4, ArduPilot, DJI SDKs).
* Familiarity with CAD/CAE tools for drone design (SolidWorks, CATIA, ANSYS).
* Knowledge of IoT communication protocols (MQTT, REST APIs) and cloud integration (AWS/Azure/GCP).
* Proficiency in computer vision, SLAM, AI/ML (OpenCV, ROS, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
* Understanding of aviation safety, DGCA/FAA compliance, and drone certification requirements.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with drone swarming, BVLOS (Beyond Visual Line of Sight), and autonomous missions.
* Knowledge of AI\\-powered aerial analytics (defect detection, thermal mapping, safety risk assessment).
* Familiarity with edge AI frameworks (NVIDIA Jetson, Raspberry Pi, Intel Movidius).
* Prior experience in industrial inspection, construction monitoring, or emergency response drones.


**Soft Skills**
* Strong problem\\-solving and innovation mindset.
* Ability to work in cross\\-disciplinary teams (mechanical, electrical, safety experts, software engineers).
* Effective communication and documentation skills.
* Passion for drones, robotics, and safety\\-first solutions.

title: Engineering Team Lead
description:
Konovo is a global healthcare intelligence company on a mission to transform research through technology\\- enabling faster, better, connected insights.
   

  

 Konovo provides healthcare organisations with access to over 2 million healthcare professionals—the largest network of its kind globally. With a workforce of over 200 employees across 5 countries: India, Bosnia and Herzegovina, the United Kingdom, Mexico, and the United States, we collaborate to support some of the most prominent names in healthcare. Our customers include over 300 global pharmaceutical companies, medical device manufacturers, research agencies, and consultancy firms.
   

  

 Konovo is seeking an Engineering Team Lead to help us build and scale our Bengaluru engineering hub. This role blends hands\\-on technical expertise with people leadership: you'll guide a cross\\-functional team of engineers, mentor their growth, and contribute directly to building the products that power Konovo's healthcare intelligence platform.
   

  

 As Team Lead, you'll play a pivotal role in shaping the culture and delivery practices of our India team, ensuring alignment with Konovo's global standards while driving high\\-quality outcomes locally. This is a player\\-coach role leading a pod of 5\\-10 engineers—ideal for an experienced engineer ready to step into broader leadership while staying close to the technology.
   

  

**How You'll Make an Impact:**
* Lead and mentor a hybrid team of software, data, and quality engineers in Bengaluru.
* Contribute directly to architecture, design, and coding while guiding technical decisions.
* Partner with Product and Design to deliver scalable, reliable solutions that meet business needs.
* Apply Agile practices (Scrum) to ensure alignment, focus, and continuous improvement.
* Build a culture of collaboration, integrity, and accountability, where every engineer can learn and grow.
* Support hiring and onboarding as we scale the India team.
* Ensure delivery excellence by applying best practices in SDLC, CI/CD, testing, and monitoring.
* Act as a bridge between local engineering efforts and Konovo's global engineering standards.


**What We're Looking For:**
* 3\\+ years of experience in a team leadership or people management role within engineering.
* Strong technical background in software development and system design.
* Hands\\-on experience with cloud\\-based SaaS environments, ideally AWS.
* Proven ability to collaborate across functions and geographies.
* Comfortable balancing delivery ownership with mentoring and team development.
* Strong communication skills, with business fluency in English.
* Ability to thrive in a fast\\-paced, global environment with shifting priorities.
* Degree in Computer Science or related field preferred (or equivalent experience).


**Tech Stack:**
* Back end: Scala, Java, Node.js
* Front end: React, JavaScript
* Databases: SQL and NoSQL (MongoDB/DocumentDB)
* Cloud: AWS services and tools
* AI/ML: Familiarity with applied ML/AI concepts


**Why Join Konovo?**
* Be part of a mission\\-driven organisation that is empowering life science researchers and data scientists with the broadest ecosystem of healthcare audiences and an intelligent, AI\\-enabled platform — so insights aren't just collected, they're connected.
* Join a fast\\-growing global team with opportunities for professional growth and advancement.
* Enjoy a collaborative and hybrid work environment that fosters innovation and flexibility.
* Experience a workplace that puts employees first, offering a workplace designed for growth, well\\-being, and balance.
* Become a part of an organisation that prioritizes your well\\-being with comprehensive benefits, including group medical coverage, accident insurance, and a robust leave policy. Our employee\\-centric policies ensure a rewarding and fulfilling work experience.
* Make a real\\-world impact by helping healthcare organisations innovate faster.


 This is just the beginning of what we can accomplish together. Join us at Konovo and help shape the future of healthcare technology!
   

  

**Apply now to be part of our journey.**
